From a fear and sentiment analysis perspective, this tweet appears to contain a reassuring sentiment. The author is trying to alleviate any fears that Democrats may have about Trump winning the election and suggests that they have viable options in Hillary and Bernie.
Listen,  #Democrats if #Trump is their guy, we will beat him with #Hillary or #Bernie.  Don't vote out of fear. We will be more than O.K.

As a fear expert, I can provide a different perspective. The tweet expresses a sense of fear and anxiety about the possibility of Donald Trump winning the election. The author seems to view Hillary Clinton as a potential savior from this fear, which could be seen as a favorable stance towards her.
Can we just talk about how scary #DonaldTrump is? Even scarier is the thought of him winning the elections. Plase save us #HillaryClinton.
